Control Name: 3.8.1 Performance goals are based on device and/or connectivity type as appropriate.
Control Statement: It is important to identify how users are connecting to your application. Are they primarily connecting via a wired connection, wireless, or by using a mobile device? Additionally, you should seek to understand the targeted device types, whether that a mobile device, a tablet or laptop/desktop PC.
